lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony says his US men's basketball teammates need to accept responsibility and move on after reports that three players visited a legal brothel in Rio de Janeiro.

headline.print_headline: Melo: Team Must Move on After Reports of Brothel Visit
headline.main: Melo: Team Must Move on After Reports of Brothel Visit

snippet: Carmelo Anthony says his US men's basketball teammates need to accept responsibility and move on after reports that three players visited a legal brothel in Rio de Janeiro....
